2464 {
2465 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
2466 me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
2467
2468 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE)
2469 {
2470 // If cast flag SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE is set combat movement will not be allowed
2471 // unless target is outside spell range, out of mana, or LOS.
2472
2473 bool _allowMove = false;
2474 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.castCustom.spell); // AssertSpellInfo?
2475 int32 mana = me->GetPower(POWER_MANA);
2476
2477 if (me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) > spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true) ||
2478 me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) < spellInfo->GetMinRange(true) ||
2479 !me->IsWithinLOSInMap(target->ToUnit()) ||
2480 mana < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
2481 _allowMove = true;
2482
2483 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(_allowMove);
2484 }
2485
2486 if (!(e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.castCustom.spell))
2487 {
2488 CustomSpellValues values;
2489 if (e.action.castCustom.bp1)
2490 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, e.action.castCustom.bp1);
2491 if (e.action.castCustom.bp2)
2492 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, e.action.castCustom.bp2);
2493 if (e.action.castCustom.bp3)
2494 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, e.action.castCustom.bp3);
2495 me->CastCustomSpell(e.action.castCustom.spell, values, target->ToUnit(), (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) ? TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK : TRIGGERED_NONE);
2496 }
2497 }
2498 }
2499 break;
2500 }
2501 case SMART_ACTION_VORTEX_SUMMON:
2502 {
2503 if (!me)
2504 break;
2505
2506 if (targets.empty())
2507 break;
2508
2509 TempSummonType summon_type = (e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2510
2511 float a = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.a);
2512 float k = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.k) / 1000.0f;
2513 float r_max = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.r_max);
2514 float delta_phi = M_PI * static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.phi_delta) / 180.0f;
2515
2516 // r(phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi)
2517 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * (phi + delta_phi))
2518 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2519 // r(phi + delta_phi) = r(phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2520 float factor = std::exp(k * delta_phi);
2521
2522 // r(0) = a * e ^ (k * 0) = a * e ^ 0 = a * 1 = a
2523 float summonRadius = a;
2524
2525 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2526 {
2527 // Offset by orientation, should not count into radius calculation,
2528 // but is needed for vortex direction (polar coordinates)
2529 float phi = target->GetOrientation();
2530
2531 do
2532 {
2533 Position summonPosition(*target);
2534 summonPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(phi, summonRadius);
2535
2536 me->SummonCreature(e.action.summonVortex.summonEntry, summonPosition, summon_type, e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration);
2537
2538 phi += delta_phi;
2539 summonRadius *= factor;
2540 } while (summonRadius <= r_max);
2541 }
2542
2543 break;
2544 }
2545 case SMART_ACTION_CONE_SUMMON:
2546 {
2547 if (!me)
2548 break;
2549
2550 TempSummonType spawnType = (e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2551
2552 float distInARow = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenSummons);
2553 float coneAngle = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.coneAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f;
2554
2555 for (uint32 radius = 0; radius <= e.action.coneSummon.coneLength; radius += e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenRings)
2556 {
2557 float deltaAngle = 0.0f;
2558 if (radius > 0)
2559 deltaAngle = distInARow / radius;
2560
2561 uint32 count = 1;
2562 if (deltaAngle > 0)
2563 count += coneAngle / deltaAngle;
2564
2565 float currentAngle = -static_cast<float>(count) * deltaAngle / 2.0f;
2566
2567 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2568 currentAngle += G3D::fuzzyGt(e.target.o, 0.0f) ? (e.target.o - me->GetOrientation()) : 0.0f;
2569 else if (!targets.empty())
2570 {
2571 currentAngle += (me->GetAngle(targets.front()) - me->GetOrientation());
2572 }
2573
2574 for (uint32 index = 0; index < count; ++index)
2575 {
2576 Position spawnPosition(*me);
2577 spawnPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(currentAngle, radius);
2578 currentAngle += deltaAngle;
2579
2580 me->SummonCreature(e.action.coneSummon.summonEntry, spawnPosition, spawnType, e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration);
2581 }
2582 }
2583
2584 break;
2585 }
2586 case SMART_ACTION_CU_ENCOUNTER_START:
2587 {
2588 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2589 {
2590 if (Player* playerTarget = target->ToPlayer())
2591 {
2592 playerTarget->RemoveArenaSpellCooldowns();
2593 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57724); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Sated (Heroism)
2594 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57723); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Exhaustion (Bloodlust)
2595 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(2825); // Bloodlust
2596 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(32182); // Heroism
2597 }
2598 }
2599
2600 break;
2601 }
2602 case SMART_ACTION_DO_ACTION:
2603 {
2604 int32 const actionId = e.action.doAction.isNegative ? -e.action.doAction.actionId : e.action.doAction.actionId;
2605 if (!e.action.doAction.instanceTarget)
2606 {
2607 if (targets.empty())
2608 break;
2609
2610 for (WorldObject* objTarget : targets)
2611 {
2612 if (Creature const* unitTarget = objTarget->ToCreature())
2613 {
2614 if (unitTarget->IsAIEnabled)
2615 {
2616 unitTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2617 }
2618 }
2619 else if (GameObject const* gobjTarget = objTarget->ToGameObject())
2620 {
2621 gobjTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2622 }
2623 }
2624
2625 }
2626 else
2627 {
2628 InstanceScript* instanceScript = nullptr;
2629 if (WorldObject* baseObj = GetBaseObject())
2630 {
2631 instanceScript = baseObj->GetInstanceScript();
2632 }
2633 // Action is triggered by AreaTrigger
2634 else if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
2635 {
2636 instanceScript = unit->GetInstanceScript();
2637 }
2638
2639 if (instanceScript)
2640 {
2641 instanceScript->DoAction(actionId);
2642 }
2643 }
2644 break;
2645 }
2646 case SMART_ACTION_DISABLE_EVADE:
2647 {
2648 if (!IsSmart())
2649 break;
2650
2651 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetEvadeDisabled(e.action.disableEvade.disable != 0);
2652 break;
2653 }
2654 case SMART_ACTION_SET_CORPSE_DELAY:
2655 {
2656 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2657 {
2658 if (IsCreature(target))
2659 target->ToCreature()->SetCorpseDelay(e.action.corpseDelay.timer);
2660 }
2661 break;
2662 }
2663 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_PCT:
2664 {
2665 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2666 if (Unit* targetUnit = target->ToUnit())
2667 targetUnit->SetHealth(targetUnit->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.setHealthPct.percent));
2668 break;
2669 }
2670 case SMART_ACTION_SET_MOVEMENT_SPEED:
2671 {
2672 uint32 speedInteger = e.action.movementSpeed.speedInteger;
2673 uint32 speedFraction = e.action.movementSpeed.speedFraction;
2674 float speed = float(speedInteger) + float(speedFraction) / std::pow(10, std::floor(std::log10(float(speedFraction ? speedFraction : 1)) + 1));
2675
2676 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2677 if (IsCreature(target))
2678 target->ToCreature()->SetSpeed(UnitMoveType(e.action.movementSpeed.movementType), speed);
2679
2680 break;
2681 }
2682 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_CINEMATIC:
2683 {
2684 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2685 {
2686 if (!IsPlayer(target))
2687 continue;
2688
2689 target->ToPlayer()->SendCinematicStart(e.action.cinematic.entry);
2690 }
2691 break;
2692 }
2693 default:
2694 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Unhandled Action type {}", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType());
2695 break;
2696 }
2697
2698 if (e.link && e.link != e.event_id)
2699 {
2700 SmartScriptHolder linked = FindLinkedEvent(e.link);
2701 if (linked.GetActionType() && linked.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
2702 ProcessEvent(linked, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
2703 else
2704 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Link Event {} not found or invalid, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.link);
2705 }
2706}
2707
2708void SmartScript::ProcessTimedAction(SmartScriptHolder& e, uint32 const& min, uint32 const& max, Unit* unit, uint32 var0, uint32 var1, bool bvar, SpellInfo const* spell, GameObject* gob)
2709{
2710 // xinef: extended by selfs victim
2711 ConditionList const conds = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForSmartEvent(e.entryOrGuid, e.event_id, e.source_type);
2712 ConditionSourceInfo info = ConditionSourceInfo(unit, GetBaseObject(), me ? me->GetVictim() : nullptr);
2713
2714 if (sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(info, conds))
2715 {
2716 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
2717 RecalcTimer(e, min, max);
2718 }
2719 else
2720 RecalcTimer(e, 5000, 5000);
2721}
2722
2723void SmartScript::InstallTemplate(SmartScriptHolder const& e)
2724{
2725 if (!GetBaseObject())
2726 return;
2727 if (mTemplate != SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC)
2728 {
2729 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::InstallTemplate: Entry {} SourceType {} AI Template can not be set more then once, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType());
2730 return;
2731 }
2732 mTemplate = (SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id;
2733 switch ((SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id)
2734 {
2735 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CASTER:
2736 {
2737 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2738 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 300, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2739 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4 > 10 ? e.action.installTtemplate.param4 - 10 : 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2740 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5 - 15 > 100 ? 100 : e.action.installTtemplate.param5 + 15, 100, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2741 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2742 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2743 break;
2744 }
2745 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_TURRET:
2746 {
2747 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2748 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2749 break;
2750 }
2751 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_NPC_PART:
2752 {
2753 if (!me)
2754 return;
2755 //store cage as id1
2756 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
2757
2758 //reset(close) cage on hostage(me) respawn
2759 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 5, 0, 0, 0);
2760
2761 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2762 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2763
2764 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2765 //phase 1: give quest credit on movepoint reached
2766 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2767 //phase 1: despawn after time on movepoint reached
2768 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2769
2770 if (sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(me->GetEntry(), (uint8)e.action.installTtemplate.param5))
2771 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_TALK, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
2772 break;
2773 }
2774 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_GO_PART:
2775 {
2776 if (!go)
2777 return;
2778 //store hostage as id1
2779 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
2780 //store invoker as id2
2781 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2782 //signal hostage
2783 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2784 //when hostage raeched end point, give credit to invoker
2785 if (e.action.installTtemplate.param2)
2786 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2787 else
2788 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
2789 break;
2790 }
2791 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC:
2792 default:
2793 return;
2794 }
2795}
2796
2797void SmartScript::AddEvent(SMART_EVENT e, uint32 event_flags, uint32 event_param1, uint32 event_param2, uint32 event_param3, uint32 event_param4, uint32 event_param5, SMART_ACTION action, uint32 action_param1, uint32 action_param2, uint32 action_param3, uint32 action_param4, uint32 action_param5, uint32 action_param6, SMARTAI_TARGETS t, uint32 target_param1, uint32 target_param2, uint32 target_param3, uint32 target_param4, uint32 phaseMask)
2798{
2799 mInstallEvents.push_back(CreateSmartEvent(e, event_flags, event_param1, event_param2, event_param3, event_param4, event_param5, action, action_param1, action_param2, action_param3, action_param4, action_param5, action_param6, t, target_param1, target_param2, target_param3, target_param4, phaseMask));
2800}
2801
2802SmartScriptHolder SmartScript::CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT e, uint32 event_flags, uint32 event_param1, uint32 event_param2, uint32 event_param3, uint32 event_param4, uint32 event_param5, SMART_ACTION action, uint32 action_param1, uint32 action_param2, uint32 action_param3, uint32 action_param4, uint32 action_param5, uint32 action_param6, SMARTAI_TARGETS t, uint32 target_param1, uint32 target_param2, uint32 target_param3, uint32 target_param4, uint32 phaseMask)
2803{
2804 SmartScriptHolder script;
2805 script.event.type = e;
2806 script.event.raw.param1 = event_param1;
2807 script.event.raw.param2 = event_param2;
2808 script.event.raw.param3 = event_param3;
2809 script.event.raw.param4 = event_param4;
2810 script.event.raw.param5 = event_param5;
2811 script.event.event_phase_mask = phaseMask;
2812 script.event.event_flags = event_flags;
2813 script.event.event_chance = 100;
2814
2815 script.action.type = action;
2816 script.action.raw.param1 = action_param1;
2817 script.action.raw.param2 = action_param2;
2818 script.action.raw.param3 = action_param3;
2819 script.action.raw.param4 = action_param4;
2820 script.action.raw.param5 = action_param5;
2821 script.action.raw.param6 = action_param6;
2822
2823 script.target.type = t;
2824 script.target.raw.param1 = target_param1;
2825 script.target.raw.param2 = target_param2;
2826 script.target.raw.param3 = target_param3;
2827 script.target.raw.param4 = target_param4;
2828
2829 script.source_type = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE;
2830 InitTimer(script);
2831 return script;
2832}
2833
2834void SmartScript::GetTargets(ObjectVector& targets, SmartScriptHolder const& e, Unit* invoker /*= nullptr*/) const
2835{
2836 Unit* scriptTrigger = nullptr;
2837 if (invoker)
2838 scriptTrigger = invoker;
2839 else if (Unit* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
2840 scriptTrigger = tempLastInvoker;
2841
2842 WorldObject* baseObject = GetBaseObject();
2843
2844 switch (e.GetTargetType())
2845 {
2846 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
2847 if (baseObject)
2848 targets.push_back(baseObject);
2849 break;
2850 case SMART_TARGET_VICTIM:
2851 if (me)
2852 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
2853 targets.push_back(victim);
2854 break;
2855 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_SECOND_AGGRO:
2856 if (me)
2857 {
2858 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2859 {
2860 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2861 targets.push_back(u);
2862 }
2863 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2864 targets.push_back(u);
2865 }
2866 break;
2867 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_LAST_AGGRO:
2868 if (me)
2869 {
2870 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2871 {
2872 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2873 targets.push_back(u);
2874 }
2875 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2876 targets.push_back(u);
2877 }
2878 break;
2879 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM:
2880 if (me)
2881 {
2882 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2883 {
2884 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2885 targets.push_back(u);
2886 }
2887 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2888 targets.push_back(u);
2889 }
2890 break;
2891 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM_NOT_TOP:
2892 if (me)
2893 {
2894 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
2895 {
2896 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
2897 targets.push_back(u);
2898 }
2899 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly))
2900 targets.push_back(u);
2901 }
2902 break;
2903 case SMART_TARGET_FARTHEST:
2904 if (me)
2905 {
2906 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinDistance, 0, FarthestTargetSelector(me, e.target.farthest.maxDist, e.target.farthest.playerOnly, e.target.farthest.isInLos)))
2907 targets.push_back(u);
2908 }
2909 break;
2910 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
2911 if (scriptTrigger)
2912 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
2913 break;
2914 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER_VEHICLE:
2915 if (scriptTrigger && scriptTrigger->GetVehicle() && scriptTrigger->GetVehicle()->GetBase())
2916 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger->GetVehicle()->GetBase());
2917 break;
2918 case SMART_TARGET_INVOKER_PARTY:
2919 if (scriptTrigger)
2920 {
2921 if (Player* player = scriptTrigger->ToPlayer())
2922 {
2923 if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
2924 {
2925 for (GroupReference* groupRef = group->GetFirstMember(); groupRef != nullptr; groupRef = groupRef->next())
2926 if (Player* member = groupRef->GetSource())
2927 if (member->IsInMap(player))
2928 targets.push_back(member);
2929 }
2930 // We still add the player to the list if there is no group. If we do
2931 // this even if there is a group (thus the else-check), it will add the
2932 // same player to the list twice. We don't want that to happen.
2933 else
2934 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
2935 }
2936 }
2937 break;
2938 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
2939 {
2940 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
2941 if (!ref)
2942 ref = scriptTrigger;
2943
2944 if (!ref)
2945 {
2946 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker",
2947 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
2948 break;
2949 }
2950
2951 ObjectVector units;
2952 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitRange.maxDist));
2953
2954 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
2955 {
2956 if (!IsCreature(unit))
2957 continue;
2958
2959 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
2960 continue;
2961
2962 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
2963 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitRange.livingState)
2964 {
2965 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
2966 continue;
2967 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
2968 continue;
2969 }
2970
2971 if (((e.target.unitRange.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitRange.creature) || !e.target.unitRange.creature) && ref->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.unitRange.minDist, (float)e.target.unitRange.maxDist))
2972 targets.push_back(unit);
2973 }
2974
2975 break;
2976 }
2977 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
2978 {
2979 ObjectVector units;
2980 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitDistance.dist));
2981
2982 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
2983 {
2984 if (!IsCreature(unit))
2985 continue;
2986
2987 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
2988 continue;
2989
2990 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
2991 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitDistance.livingState)
2992 {
2993 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
2994 continue;
2995 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
2996 continue;
2997 }
2998
2999 if ((e.target.unitDistance.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitDistance.creature) || !e.target.unitDistance.creature)
3000 targets.push_back(unit);
3001 }
3002
3003 break;
3004 }
3005 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE:
3006 {
3007 ObjectVector units;
3008 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goDistance.dist));
3009
3010 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3011 {
3012 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3013 continue;
3014
3015 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3016 continue;
3017
3018 if ((e.target.goDistance.entry && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goDistance.entry) || !e.target.goDistance.entry)
3019 targets.push_back(unit);
3020 }
3021
3022 break;
3023 }
3024 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE:
3025 {
3026
3027 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3028 if (!ref)
3029 ref = scriptTrigger;
3030
3031 if (!ref)
3032 {
3033 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE: Entry: {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3034 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3035 break;
3036 }
3037
3038 ObjectVector units;
3039 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goRange.maxDist));
3040
3041 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3042 {
3043 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3044 continue;
3045
3046 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3047 continue;
3048
3049 if (((e.target.goRange.entry && IsGameObject(unit) && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goRange.entry) || !e.target.goRange.entry) && ref->IsInRange((unit), (float)e.target.goRange.minDist, (float)e.target.goRange.maxDist))
3050 targets.push_back(unit);
3051 }
3052
3053 break;
3054 }
3055 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
3056 {
3057 if (!scriptTrigger && !baseObject)
3058 {
3059 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3060 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3061 break;
3062 }
3063
3064 Creature* target = FindCreatureNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.unitGUID.dbGuid);
3065 if (target && (!e.target.unitGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.unitGUID.entry))
3066 targets.push_back(target);
3067 break;
3068 }
3069 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID:
3070 {
3071 if (!scriptTrigger && !GetBaseObject())
3072 {
3073 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3074 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3075 break;
3076 }
3077
3078 GameObject* target = FindGameObjectNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.goGUID.dbGuid);
3079 if (target && (!e.target.goGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.goGUID.entry))
3080 targets.push_back(target);
3081 break;
3082 }
3083 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3084 {
3085 ObjectVector units;
3086 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerRange.maxDist));
3087
3088 if (!units.empty() && baseObject)
3089 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3090 if (IsPlayer(unit) && baseObject->IsInRange(unit, float(e.target.playerRange.minDist), float(e.target.playerRange.maxDist)))
3091 targets.push_back(unit);
3092 break;
3093 }
3094 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3095 {
3096 ObjectVector units;
3097 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3098
3099 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3100 if (IsPlayer(unit))
3101 targets.push_back(unit);
3102 break;
3103 }
3104 case SMART_TARGET_STORED:
3105 {
3106 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3107 if (!ref)
3108 ref = scriptTrigger;
3109
3110 if (!ref)
3111 {
3112 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_STORED: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3113 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3114 break;
3115 }
3116
3117 if (ObjectVector const* stored = GetStoredTargetVector(e.target.stored.id, *ref))
3118 targets.assign(stored->begin(), stored->end());
3119 break;
3120 }
3121 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3122 {
3123 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3124
3125 if (!ref)
3126 ref = scriptTrigger;
3127
3128 if (!ref)
3129 {
3130 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3131 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3132 break;
3133 }
3134
3135 Creature* target = GetClosestCreatureWithEntry(ref, e.target.unitClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.unitClosest.dist ? e.target.unitClosest.dist : 100), !e.target.unitClosest.dead);
3136 if (target)
3137 targets.push_back(target);
3138 break;
3139 }
3140 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT:
3141 {
3142 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3143
3144 if (!ref)
3145 ref = scriptTrigger;
3146
3147 if (!ref)
3148 {
3149 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3150 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3151 break;
3152 }
3153
3154 GameObject* target = GetClosestGameObjectWithEntry(ref, e.target.goClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.goClosest.dist ? e.target.goClosest.dist : 100), e.target.goClosest.onlySpawned);
3155 if (target)
3156 targets.push_back(target);
3157 break;
3158 }
3159 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3160 {
3161 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3162
3163 if (!ref)
3164 ref = scriptTrigger;
3165
3166 if (!ref)
3167 {
3168 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3169 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3170 break;
3171 }
3172
3173 if (Player* target = ref->SelectNearestPlayer((float)e.target.playerDistance.dist))
3174 targets.push_back(target);
3175 break;
3176 }
3177 case SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER:
3178 /*
3179 * Owners/Summoners should be WorldObjects. This allows to have other objects
3180 * such as gameobjects to execute SmartScripts using this type of target.
3181 * Otherwise, only Units like creatures can summon other creatures.
3182 */
3183 {
3184 if (me)
3185 {
3186 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*me, me->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3187 {
3188 targets.push_back(owner);
3189 }
3190 else if (me->IsSummon() && me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit())
3191 {
3192 targets.push_back(me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit());
3193 }
3194 }
3195 else if (go)
3196 {
3197 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*go, go->GetOwnerGUID()))
3198 {
3199 targets.push_back(owner);
3200 }
3201 }
3202
3203 // xinef: Get owner of owner
3204 if (e.target.owner.useCharmerOrOwner && !targets.empty())
3205 {
3206 if (Unit* owner = targets.front()->ToUnit())
3207 {
3208 targets.clear();
3209
3210 if (Unit* base = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*owner, owner->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3211 {
3212 targets.push_back(base);
3213 }
3214 }
3215 }
3216 break;
3217 }
3218 case SMART_TARGET_THREAT_LIST:
3219 {
3220 if (me)
3221 {
3222 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
3223 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
3224 if (Unit* temp = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
3225 // Xinef: added distance check
3226 if (e.target.threatList.maxDist == 0 || me->IsWithinCombatRange(temp, (float)e.target.threatList.maxDist))
3227 targets.push_back(temp);
3228 }
3229 break;
3230 }
3231 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY:
3232 {
3233 if (me)
3234 if (Unit* target = me->SelectNearestTarget(e.target.closestAttackable.maxDist, e.target.closestAttackable.playerOnly))
3235 targets.push_back(target);
3236
3237 break;
3238 }
3239 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY:
3240 {
3241 if (me)
3242 if (Unit* target = DoFindClosestFriendlyInRange(e.target.closestFriendly.maxDist, e.target.closestFriendly.playerOnly))
3243 targets.push_back(target);
3244
3245 break;
3246 }
3247 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_WITH_AURA:
3248 {
3249 ObjectVector units;
3250 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3251
3252 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3253 if (IsPlayer(unit) && unit->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !unit->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3254 if (GetBaseObject()->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMin, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMax))
3255 if (bool(e.target.playerWithAura.negation) != unit->ToPlayer()->HasAura(e.target.playerWithAura.spellId))
3256 targets.push_back(unit);
3257
3258 if (e.target.o > 0)
3259 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.o);
3260
3261 break;
3262 }
3263 case SMART_TARGET_ROLE_SELECTION:
3264 {
3265 ObjectVector units;
3266 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3267 // 1 = Tanks, 2 = Healer, 4 = Damage
3268 uint32 roleMask = e.target.roleSelection.roleMask;
3269 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3270 if (Player* targetPlayer = unit->ToPlayer())
3271 if (targetPlayer->IsAlive() && !targetPlayer->IsGameMaster())
3272 {
3273 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_TANKS)
3274 {
3275 if (targetPlayer->HasTankSpec())
3276 {
3277 targets.push_back(unit);
3278 continue;
3279 }
3280 }
3281 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_HEALERS)
3282 {
3283 if (targetPlayer->HasHealSpec())
3284 {
3285 targets.push_back(unit);
3286 continue;
3287 }
3288 }
3289 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_DAMAGERS)
3290 {
3291 if (targetPlayer->HasCasterSpec() || targetPlayer->HasMeleeSpec())
3292 {
3293 targets.push_back(unit);
3294 continue;
3295 }
3296 }
3297 }
3298
3299 if (e.target.roleSelection.resize > 0)
3300 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.roleSelection.resize);
3301
3302 break;
3303 }
3304 case SMART_TARGET_VEHICLE_PASSENGER:
3305 {
3306 if (me && me->IsVehicle())
3307 {
3308 if (Unit* target = me->GetVehicleKit()->GetPassenger(e.target.vehicle.seatMask))
3309 {
3310 targets.push_back(target);
3311 }
3312 }
3313 break;
3314 }
3315 case SMART_TARGET_LOOT_RECIPIENTS:
3316 {
3317 if (me)
3318 {
3319 if (Group* lootGroup = me->GetLootRecipientGroup())
3320 {
3321 for (GroupReference* it = lootGroup->GetFirstMember(); it != nullptr; it = it->next())
3322 {
3323 if (Player* recipient = it->GetSource())
3324 {
3325 targets.push_back(recipient);
3326 }
3327 }
3328 }
3329 else
3330 {
3331 if (Player* recipient = me->GetLootRecipient())
3332 {
3333 targets.push_back(recipient);
3334 }
3335 }
3336 }
3337 }
3338 case SMART_TARGET_NONE:
3339 case SMART_TARGET_POSITION:
3340 default:
3341 break;
3342 }
3343}
3344
3345void SmartScript::GetWorldObjectsInDist(ObjectVector& targets, float dist) const
3346{
3347 WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
3348 if (!obj)
3349 return;
3350
3351 Acore::AllWorldObjectsInRange u_check(obj, dist);
3352 Acore::WorldObjectListSearcher<Acore::AllWorldObjectsInRange> searcher(obj, targets, u_check);
3353 Cell::VisitAllObjects(obj, searcher, dist);
3354}
3355
3356void SmartScript::ProcessEvent(SmartScriptHolder& e, Unit* unit, uint32 var0, uint32 var1, bool bvar, SpellInfo const* spell, GameObject* gob)
3357{
3358 if (!e.active && e.GetEventType() != SMART_EVENT_LINK)
3359 return;
3360
3361 if ((e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask)) || ((e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE) && e.runOnce))
3362 return;
3363
3364 if (!(e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_WHILE_CHARMED) && IsCharmedCreature(me))
3365 return;
3366
3367 switch (e.GetEventType())
3368 {
3369 case SMART_EVENT_LINK://special handling
3370 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3371 break;
3372 //called from Update tick
3373 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
3374 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3375 break;
3376 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
3377 if (me && me->IsEngaged())
3378 return;
3379 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3380 break;
3381 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
3382 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3383 return;
3384 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3385 break;
3386 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
3387 {
3388 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxHealth())
3389 return;
3390 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetHealthPct();
3391 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3392 return;
3393 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3394 break;
3395 }
3396 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
3397 {
3398 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxHealth())
3399 return;
3400 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetVictim()->GetHealthPct();
3401 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3402 return;
3403 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3404 break;
3405 }
3406 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
3407 {
3408 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
3409 return;
3410 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
3411 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3412 return;
3413 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3414 break;
3415 }
3416 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
3417 {
3418 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
3419 return;
3420 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetVictim()->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
3421 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3422 return;
3423 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3424 break;
3425 }
3426 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
3427 {
3428 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim())
3429 return;
3430
3431 if (me->IsInRange(me->GetVictim(), (float)e.event.rangeRepeat.minRange, (float)e.event.rangeRepeat.maxRange))
3432 {
3433 if (e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat == 2)
3434 {
3435 e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat = 1;
3436 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMax);
3437 }
3438 else
3439 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.rangeRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3440 }
3441 else
3442 RecalcTimer(e, 500, 500); // make it predictable
3443
3444 break;
3445 }
3446 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
3447 {
3448 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3449 return;
3450
3451 Unit* victim = me->GetVictim();
3452
3453 if (!victim || !victim->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
3454 return;
3455
3456 if (e.event.targetCasting.spellId > 0)
3457 if (Spell* currSpell = victim->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
3458 if (currSpell->m_spellInfo->Id != e.event.targetCasting.spellId)
3459 return;
3460
3461 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMin, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3462 break;
3463 }
3464 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
3465 {
3466 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3467 return;
3468
3469 Unit* target = DoSelectLowestHpFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealth.radius, e.event.friendlyHealth.hpDeficit);
3470 if (!target || !target->IsInCombat())
3471 {
3472 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
3473 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
3474 return;
3475 }
3476 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMax, target);
3477 break;
3478 }
3479 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
3480 {
3481 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3482 return;
3483
3484 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
3485 DoFindFriendlyCC(creatures, float(e.event.friendlyCC.radius));
3486 if (creatures.empty())
3487 {
3488 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
3489 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
3490 return;
3491 }
3492 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
3493 break;
3494 }
3495 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
3496 {
3497 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
3498 DoFindFriendlyMissingBuff(creatures, float(e.event.missingBuff.radius), e.event.missingBuff.spell);
3499
3500 if (creatures.empty())
3501 return;
3502
3503 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMin, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
3504 break;
3505 }
3506 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
3507 {
3508 if (!me)
3509 return;
3510 uint32 count = me->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
3511 if ((!e.event.aura.count && !count) || (e.event.aura.count && count >= e.event.aura.count))
3512 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax);
3513 break;
3514 }
3515 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
3516 {
3517 if (!me || !me->GetVictim())
3518 return;
3519 uint32 count = me->GetVictim()->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
3520 if (count < e.event.aura.count)
3521 return;
3522 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
3523 break;
3524 }
3525 case SMART_EVENT_CHARMED:
3526 {
3527 if (bvar == (e.event.charm.onRemove != 1))
3528 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3529 break;
3530 }
3531 //no params
3532 case SMART_EVENT_AGGRO:
3533 case SMART_EVENT_DEATH:
3534 case SMART_EVENT_EVADE:
3535 case SMART_EVENT_REACHED_HOME:
3536 case SMART_EVENT_CHARMED_TARGET:
3537 case SMART_EVENT_CORPSE_REMOVED:
3538 case SMART_EVENT_AI_INIT:
3539 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_ADDPLAYER:
3540 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_REMOVE_PLAYER:
3541 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_ACCEPTED:
3542 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_OBJ_COMPLETION:
3543 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_COMPLETION:
3544 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_REWARDED:
3545 case SMART_EVENT_QUEST_FAIL:
3546 case SMART_EVENT_JUST_SUMMONED:
3547 case SMART_EVENT_RESET:
3548 case SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED:
3549 case SMART_EVENT_FOLLOW_COMPLETED:
3550 case SMART_EVENT_ON_SPELLCLICK:
3551 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3552 break;
3553
3554 case SMART_EVENT_GOSSIP_HELLO:
3555 switch (e.event.gossipHello.filter)
3556 {
3557 case 0:
3558 // no filter set, always execute action
3559 break;
3560 case 1:
3561 // GossipHello only filter set, skip action if reportUse
3562 if (var0)
3563 {
3564 return;
3565 }
3566 break;
3567 case 2:
3568 // reportUse only filter set, skip action if GossipHello
3569 if (!var0)
3570 {
3571 return;
3572 }
3573 break;
3574 default:
3575 // Ignore any other value
3576 break;
3577 }
3578
3579 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3580 break;
3581 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
3582 {
3583 if (!me)
3584 return;
3585
3586 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
3587 {
3588 if (!victim->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), me))
3589 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.behindTarget.cooldownMin, e.event.behindTarget.cooldownMax, victim);
3590 }
3591 break;
3592 }
3593 case SMART_EVENT_RECEIVE_EMOTE:
3594 if (e.event.emote.emote == var0)
3595 {
3596 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3597 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.emote.cooldownMin, e.event.emote.cooldownMax);
3598 }
3599 break;
3600 case SMART_EVENT_KILL:
3601 {
3602 if (!me || !unit)
3603 return;
3604 if (e.event.kill.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3605 return;
3606 if (e.event.kill.creature && unit->GetEntry() != e.event.kill.creature)
3607 return;
3608 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.kill.cooldownMin, e.event.kill.cooldownMax);
3609 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3610 break;
3611 }
3612 case SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT_TARGET:
3613 case SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT:
3614 {
3615 if (!spell)
3616 return;
3617 if ((!e.event.spellHit.spell || spell->Id == e.event.spellHit.spell) &&
3618 (!e.event.spellHit.school || (spell->SchoolMask & e.event.spellHit.school)))
3619 {
3620 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.spellHit.cooldownMin, e.event.spellHit.cooldownMax);
3621 ProcessAction(e, unit, 0, 0, bvar, spell);
3622 }
3623 break;
3624 }
3625 case SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS:
3626 {
3627 if (!me || me->IsEngaged())
3628 return;
3629 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
3630 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
3631
3632 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
3633 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
3634 {
3635 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
3636 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
3637 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
3638 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
3639 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
3640 {
3641 if (e.event.los.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3642 return;
3643 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
3644 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3645 }
3646 }
3647 break;
3648 }
3649 case SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS:
3650 {
3651 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3652 return;
3653 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
3654 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
3655
3656 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
3657 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
3658 {
3659 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
3660 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
3661 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
3662 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
3663 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
3664 {
3665 if (e.event.los.playerOnly && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3666 return;
3667 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
3668 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3669 }
3670 }
3671 break;
3672 }
3673 case SMART_EVENT_RESPAWN:
3674 {
3675 if (!GetBaseObject())
3676 return;
3677 if (e.event.respawn.type == SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_MAP && GetBaseObject()->GetMapId() != e.event.respawn.map)
3678 return;
3679 if (e.event.respawn.type == SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_AREA && GetBaseObject()->GetZoneId() != e.event.respawn.area)
3680 return;
3681 ProcessAction(e);
3682 break;
3683 }
3684 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMONED_UNIT:
3685 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMONED_UNIT_DIES:
3686 {
3687 if (!IsCreature(unit))
3688 return;
3689 if (e.event.summoned.creature && unit->GetEntry() != e.event.summoned.creature)
3690 return;
3691 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.summoned.cooldownMin, e.event.summoned.cooldownMax);
3692 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3693 break;
3694 }
3695 case SMART_EVENT_RECEIVE_HEAL:
3696 case SMART_EVENT_DAMAGED:
3697 case SMART_EVENT_DAMAGED_TARGET:
3698 {
3699 if (var0 > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || var0 < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
3700 return;
3701 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
3702 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3703 break;
3704 }
3705 case SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM:
3706 {
3707 if ((e.event.movementInform.type && var0 != e.event.movementInform.type) || (e.event.movementInform.id && var1 != e.event.movementInform.id))
3708 return;
3709 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3710 break;
3711 }
3712 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_RELOCATE:
3713 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_START:
3714 {
3715 if (e.event.waypoint.pathID && var0 != e.event.waypoint.pathID)
3716 return;
3717 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3718 break;
3719 }
3720 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_REACHED:
3721 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_RESUMED:
3722 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_PAUSED:
3723 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_STOPPED:
3724 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_ENDED:
3725 {
3726 if (!me || (e.event.waypoint.pointID && var0 != e.event.waypoint.pointID) || (e.event.waypoint.pathID && GetPathId() != e.event.waypoint.pathID))
3727 return;
3728 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3729 break;
3730 }
3731 case SMART_EVENT_SUMMON_DESPAWNED:
3732 {
3733 if (e.event.summoned.creature && e.event.summoned.creature != var0)
3734 return;
3735 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.summoned.cooldownMin, e.event.summoned.cooldownMax);
3736 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3737 break;
3738 }
3739 case SMART_EVENT_INSTANCE_PLAYER_ENTER:
3740 {
3741 if (e.event.instancePlayerEnter.team && var0 != e.event.instancePlayerEnter.team)
3742 return;
3743 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.instancePlayerEnter.cooldownMin, e.event.instancePlayerEnter.cooldownMax);
3744 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3745 break;
3746 }
3747 case SMART_EVENT_ACCEPTED_QUEST:
3748 case SMART_EVENT_REWARD_QUEST:
3749 {
3750 if (e.event.quest.quest && var0 != e.event.quest.quest)
3751 return;
3752 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.quest.cooldownMin, e.event.quest.cooldownMax);
3753 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3754 break;
3755 }
3756 case SMART_EVENT_TRANSPORT_ADDCREATURE:
3757 {
3758 if (e.event.transportAddCreature.creature && var0 != e.event.transportAddCreature.creature)
3759 return;
3760 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3761 break;
3762 }
3763 case SMART_EVENT_AREATRIGGER_ONTRIGGER:
3764 {
3765 if (e.event.areatrigger.id && var0 != e.event.areatrigger.id)
3766 return;
3767 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3768 break;
3769 }
3770 case SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER:
3771 {
3772 if (var0 != e.event.textOver.textGroupID || (e.event.textOver.creatureEntry && e.event.textOver.creatureEntry != var1))
3773 return;
3774 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3775 break;
3776 }
3777 case SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET:
3778 {
3779 if (e.event.dataSet.id != var0 || e.event.dataSet.value != var1)
3780 return;
3781 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.dataSet.cooldownMin, e.event.dataSet.cooldownMax);
3782 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3783 break;
3784 }
3785 case SMART_EVENT_PASSENGER_REMOVED:
3786 case SMART_EVENT_PASSENGER_BOARDED:
3787 {
3788 if (!unit)
3789 return;
3790 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMax.repeatMin, e.event.minMax.repeatMax);
3791 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3792 break;
3793 }
3794 case SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED:
3795 {
3796 if (e.event.timedEvent.id == var0)
3797 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3798 break;
3799 }
3800 case SMART_EVENT_GOSSIP_SELECT:
3801 {
3802 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Gossip Select: menu {} action {}", var0, var1); //little help for scripters
3803 if (e.event.gossip.sender != var0 || e.event.gossip.action != var1)
3804 return;
3805 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3806 break;
3807 }
3808 case SMART_EVENT_EVENT_PHASE_CHANGE:
3809 {
3810 if (!IsInPhase(e.event.eventPhaseChange.phasemask))
3811 {
3812 return;
3813 }
3814
3815 ProcessAction(e, GetLastInvoker());
3816 break;
3817 }
3818 case SMART_EVENT_GAME_EVENT_START:
3819 case SMART_EVENT_GAME_EVENT_END:
3820 {
3821 if (e.event.gameEvent.gameEventId != var0)
3822 return;
3823 ProcessAction(e, nullptr, var0);
3824 break;
3825 }
3826 case SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED:
3827 {
3828 if (e.event.goStateChanged.state != var0)
3829 return;
3830 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
3831 break;
3832 }
3833 case SMART_EVENT_GO_EVENT_INFORM:
3834 {
3835 if (e.event.eventInform.eventId != var0)
3836 return;
3837 ProcessAction(e, nullptr, var0);
3838 break;
3839 }
3840 case SMART_EVENT_ACTION_DONE:
3841 {
3842 if (e.event.doAction.eventId != var0)
3843 return;
3844 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
3845 break;
3846 }
3847 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
3848 {
3849 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
3850 return;
3851
3852 ObjectVector targets;
3853 switch (e.GetTargetType())
3854 {
3855 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
3856 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
3857 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
3858 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3859 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3860 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3861 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3862 {
3863 if (targets.empty())
3864 return;
3865 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3866 {
3867 if (IsUnit(target) && me->IsFriendlyTo(target->ToUnit()) && target->ToUnit()->IsAlive() && target->ToUnit()->IsInCombat())
3868 {
3869 uint32 healthPct = uint32(target->ToUnit()->GetHealthPct());
3870 if (healthPct > e.event.friendlyHealthPct.maxHpPct || healthPct < e.event.friendlyHealthPct.minHpPct)
3871 {
3872 continue;
3873 }
3874
3875 target = target->ToUnit();
3876 break;
3877 }
3878 }
3879
3880 break;
3881 }
3882 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
3883 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
3884 DoSelectLowestHpPercentFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealthPct.radius, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.minHpPct, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.maxHpPct);
3885 break;
3886 default:
3887 return;
3888 }
3889
3890 if (targets.empty())
3891 return;
3892
3893 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMax);
3894 break;
3895 }
3896 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
3897 {
3898 if (!me)
3899 return;
3900
3901 WorldObject* creature = nullptr;
3902
3903 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
3904 {
3905 creature = FindCreatureNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
3906
3907 if (!creature)
3908 return;
3909
3910 if (!me->IsInRange(creature, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
3911 return;
3912 }
3913 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
3914 {
3915 std::list<Creature*> list;
3916 me->GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
3917
3918 if (!list.empty())
3919 creature = list.front();
3920 }
3921
3922 if (creature)
3923 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
3924
3925 break;
3926 }
3927 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
3928 {
3929 if (!me)
3930 return;
3931
3932 WorldObject* gameobject = nullptr;
3933
3934 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
3935 {
3936 gameobject = FindGameObjectNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
3937
3938 if (!gameobject)
3939 return;
3940
3941 if (!me->IsInRange(gameobject, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
3942 return;
3943 }
3944 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
3945 {
3946 std::list<GameObject*> list;
3947 me->GetGameObjectListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
3948
3949 if (!list.empty())
3950 gameobject = list.front();
3951 }
3952
3953 if (gameobject)
3954 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
3955
3956 break;
3957 }
3958 case SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET:
3959 if (e.event.counter.id != var0 || GetCounterValue(e.event.counter.id) != e.event.counter.value)
3960 return;
3961
3962 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.counter.cooldownMin, e.event.counter.cooldownMax);
3963 break;
3964 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
3965 {
3966 ObjectVector units;
3967 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayer.radius));
3968
3969 if (!units.empty())
3970 {
3971 if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3972 return;
3973
3974 if (units.size() >= e.event.nearPlayer.minCount)
3975 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3976 }
3977 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer);
3978 break;
3979 }
3980 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
3981 {
3982 ObjectVector units;
3983 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayerNegation.radius));
3984
3985 if (!units.empty())
3986 {
3987 if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3988 return;
3989
3990 if (units.size() < e.event.nearPlayerNegation.minCount)
3991 ProcessAction(e, unit);
3992 }
3993 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer);
3994 break;
3995 }
3996 default:
3997 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessEvent: Unhandled Event type {}", e.GetEventType());
3998 break;
3999 }
4000}
4001
4002void SmartScript::InitTimer(SmartScriptHolder& e)
4003{
4004 switch (e.GetEventType())
4005 {
4006 //set only events which have initial timers
4007 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4008 // If onlyFireOnRepeat is true set to 2 before entering combat. Will be set back to 1 after entering combat to ignore initial firing.
4009 if (e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat == 1)
4010 e.event.rangeRepeat.onlyFireOnRepeat = 2;
4011 // make it predictable
4012 RecalcTimer(e, 500, 500);
4013 break;
4014 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4015 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4016 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer);
4017 break;
4018 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4019 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4020 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4021 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.min, e.event.minMaxRepeat.max);
4022 break;
4023 case SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS:
4024 case SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS:
4025 // Xinef: cooldown should be processed AFTER action is done, not before...
4026 //RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
4027 //break;
4028 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4029 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4030 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4031 break;
4032 default:
4033 e.active = true;
4034 break;
4035 }
4036}
4037void SmartScript::RecalcTimer(SmartScriptHolder& e, uint32 min, uint32 max)
4038{
4039 // min/max was checked at loading!
4040 e.timer = urand(uint32(min), uint32(max));
4041 e.active = e.timer ? false : true;
4042}
4043
4044void SmartScript::UpdateTimer(SmartScriptHolder& e, uint32 const diff)
4045{
4046 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
4047 return;
4048
4049 if (e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask))
4050 return;
4051
4052 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC && (!me || !me->IsEngaged()))
4053 return;
4054
4055 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC && (me && me->IsEngaged()))//can be used with me=nullptr (go script)
4056 return;
4057
4058 if (e.timer < diff)
4059 {
4060 // delay spell cast event if another spell is being casted
4061 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_CAST)
4062 {
4063 if (!(e.action.cast.flags & (SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS | SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED)))
4064 {
4065 if (me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4066 {
4067 e.timer = 1;
4068 return;
4069 }
4070 }
4071 }
4072
4073 // Delay flee for assist event if casting
4074 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST && me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4075 {
4076 e.timer = 1;
4077 return;
4078 }
4079
4080 e.active = true;//activate events with cooldown
4081 switch (e.GetEventType())//process ONLY timed events
4082 {
4083 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4084 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4085 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4086 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4087 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4088 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
4089 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
4090 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
4091 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
4092 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4093 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
4094 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
4095 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
4096 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
4097 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
4098 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
4099 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
4100 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
4101 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4102 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4103 {
4104 ProcessEvent(e);
4105 if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST)
4106 {
4107 e.enableTimed = false;//disable event if it is in an ActionList and was processed once
4108 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4109 {
4110 //find the first event which is not the current one and enable it
4111 if (i->event_id > e.event_id)
4112 {
4113 i->enableTimed = true;
4114 break;
4115 }
4116 }
4117 }
4118 break;
4119 }
4120 }
4121 }
4122 else
4123 e.timer -= diff;
4124}
4125
4126bool SmartScript::CheckTimer(SmartScriptHolder const& e) const
4127{
4128 return e.active;
4129}
4130
4131void SmartScript::InstallEvents()
4132{
4133 if (!mInstallEvents.empty())
4134 {
4135 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mInstallEvents.begin(); i != mInstallEvents.end(); ++i)
4136 mEvents.push_back(*i);//must be before UpdateTimers
4137
4138 mInstallEvents.clear();
4139 }
4140}
4141
4142void SmartScript::OnUpdate(uint32 const diff)
4143{
4144 if ((mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE || mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT) && !GetBaseObject())
4145 return;
4146
4147 InstallEvents();//before UpdateTimers
4148
4149 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
4150 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
4151
4152 if (!mStoredEvents.empty())
4153 {
4154 SmartAIEventStoredList::iterator i, icurr;
4155 for (i = mStoredEvents.begin(); i != mStoredEvents.end();)
4156 {
4157 icurr = i++;
4158 UpdateTimer(*icurr, diff);
4159 }
4160 }
4161
4162 bool needCleanup = true;
4163 if (!mTimedActionList.empty())
4164 {
4165 isProcessingTimedActionList = true;
4166 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4167 {
4168 if ((*i).enableTimed)
4169 {
4170 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
4171 needCleanup = false;
4172 }
4173 }
4174
4175 isProcessingTimedActionList = false;
4176 }
4177 if (needCleanup)
4178 mTimedActionList.clear();
4179
4180 if (!mRemIDs.empty())
4181 {
4182 for (std::list<uint32>::const_iterator i = mRemIDs.begin(); i != mRemIDs.end(); ++i)
4183 RemoveStoredEvent(*i);
4184
4185 // xinef: clear list after cleaning...
4186 mRemIDs.clear();
4187 }
4188 if (mUseTextTimer && me)
4189 {
4190 if (mTextTimer < diff)
4191 {
4192 uint32 textID = mLastTextID;
4193 mLastTextID = 0;
4194 uint32 entry = mTalkerEntry;
4195 mTalkerEntry = 0;
4196 mTextTimer = 0;
4197 mUseTextTimer = false;
4198 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER, nullptr, textID, entry);
4199 }
4200 else mTextTimer -= diff;
4201 }
4202}
4203
4204void SmartScript::FillScript(SmartAIEventList e, WorldObject* obj, AreaTrigger const* at)
4205{
4206 (void)at; // ensure that the variable is referenced even if extra logs are disabled in order to pass compiler checks
4207
4208 if (e.empty())
4209 {
4210 if (obj)
4211 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for Entry {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", obj->GetEntry());
4212
4213 if (at)
4214 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for AreaTrigger {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", at->entry);
4215 return;
4216 }
4217 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = e.begin(); i != e.end(); ++i)
4218 {
4219#ifndef ACORE_DEBUG
4220 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DEBUG_ONLY)
4221 continue;
4222#endif
4223
4224 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DIFFICULTY_ALL)//if has instance flag add only if in it
4225 {
4226 if (obj && obj->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
4227 {
4228 if ((1 << (obj->GetMap()->GetSpawnMode() + 1)) & (*i).event.event_flags)
4229 {
4230 mEvents.push_back((*i));
4231 }
4232 }
4233 continue;
4234 }
4235 mEvents.push_back((*i));//NOTE: 'world(0)' events still get processed in ANY instance mode
4236 }
4237}
4238
4239void SmartScript::GetScript()
4240{
4241 SmartAIEventList e;
4242 if (me)
4243 {
4244 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)me->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
4245 if (e.empty())
4246 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)me->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
4247 FillScript(e, me, nullptr);
4248 }
4249 else if (go)
4250 {
4251 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)go->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
4252 if (e.empty())
4253 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)go->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
4254 FillScript(e, go, nullptr);
4255 }
4256 else if (trigger)
4257 {
4258 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)trigger->entry, mScriptType);
4259 FillScript(e, nullptr, trigger);
4260 }
4261}
4262
4263void SmartScript::OnInitialize(WorldObject* obj, AreaTrigger const* at)
4264{
4265 if (obj)//handle object based scripts
4266 {
4267 switch (obj->GetTypeId())
4268 {
4269 case TYPEID_UNIT:
4270 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE;
4271 me = obj->ToCreature();
4272 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is Creature {}", me->GetEntry());
4273 break;
4274 case TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT:
4275 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT;
4276 go = obj->ToGameObject();
4277 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is GameObject {}", go->GetEntry());
4278 break;
4279 default:
4280 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: Unhandled TypeID !WARNING!");
4281 return;
4282 }
4283 }
4284 else if (at)
4285 {
4286 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER;
4287 trigger = at;
4288 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is AreaTrigger {}", trigger->entry);
4289 }
4290 else
4291 {
4292 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: !WARNING! Initialized objects are nullptr.");
4293 return;
4294 }
4295
4296 GetScript();//load copy of script
4297
4298 uint32 maxDisableDist = 0;
4299 uint32 minEnableDist = 0;
4300 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
4301 {
4302 InitTimer((*i));//calculate timers for first time use
4303 if (i->GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_RANGE && i->GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT)
4304 {
4305 if (i->action.combatMove.move == 1 && i->event.rangeRepeat.minRange > minEnableDist)
4306 minEnableDist = i->event.rangeRepeat.minRange;
4307 else if (i->action.combatMove.move == 0 && (i->event.rangeRepeat.maxRange < maxDisableDist || maxDisableDist == 0))
4308 maxDisableDist = i->event.rangeRepeat.maxRange;
4309 }
4310
4311 // Xinef: if smartcast combat move flag is present
4312 if (i->GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_CAST && (i->action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE))
4313 {
4314 if (SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(i->action.cast.spell))
4315 {
4316 float maxRange = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4317 float minRange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4318
4319 if (maxRange > 0 && minRange <= maxRange)
4320 {
4321 smartCasterMaxDist = minRange + ((maxRange - minRange) * 0.65f);
4322 smartCasterPowerType = (Powers)spellInfo->PowerType;
4323 }
4324 }
4325 }
4326 }
4327 if (maxDisableDist > 0 && minEnableDist >= maxDisableDist)
4328 mMaxCombatDist = uint32(maxDisableDist + ((minEnableDist - maxDisableDist) / 2));
4329
4330 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_AI_INIT);
4331 InstallEvents();
4332 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED);
4333}
4334
4335void SmartScript::OnMoveInLineOfSight(Unit* who)
4336{
4337 if (!me)
4338 return;
4339
4340 ProcessEventsFor(me->IsEngaged() ? SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS : SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS, who);
4341}

4388Unit* SmartScript::DoSelectLowestHpFriendly(float range, uint32 MinHPDiff) const

4398 return unit;
4399}

4435Unit* SmartScript::DoFindClosestFriendlyInRange(float range, bool playerOnly) const
4436{

4443 Cell::VisitAllObjects(me, searcher, range);

4446
4447void SmartScript::SetScript9(SmartScriptHolder& e, uint32 entry)
4448{
4449 //do NOT clear mTimedActionList if it's being iterated because it will invalidate the iterator and delete
4450 // any SmartScriptHolder contained like the "e" parameter passed to this function
4451 if (isProcessingTimedActionList)
4452 {
4453 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is trying to overwrite timed action list from a timed action, this is not allowed!.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
4454 return;
4455 }
4456
4457 // Do NOT allow to start a new actionlist if a previous one is already running, unless explicitly allowed. We need to always finish the current actionlist
4458 if (!e.action.timedActionList.allowOverride && !mTimedActionList.empty())
4459 {
4460 return;
4461 }
4462
4463 mTimedActionList.clear();
4464 mTimedActionList = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(entry, SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST);
4465 if (mTimedActionList.empty())
4466 return;
4467 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4468 {
4469 i->enableTimed = i == mTimedActionList.begin();//enable processing only for the first action
4470
4471 if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 0)
4472 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC;
4473 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 1)
4474 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC;
4475 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType > 1)
4476 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
4477
4478 InitTimer((*i));
4479 }
4480}
4481
4482Unit* SmartScript::GetLastInvoker(Unit* invoker) const
4483{
4484 // Xinef: Look for invoker only on map of base object... Prevents multithreaded crashes
4485 if (GetBaseObject())
4486 return ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*GetBaseObject(), mLastInvoker);
4487 // xinef: used for area triggers invoker cast
4488 else if (invoker)
4489 return ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*invoker, mLastInvoker);
4490 return nullptr;
4491}

4523
4524void SmartScript::IncPhase(uint32 p)
4525{
4526 // protect phase from overflowing
4527 SetPhase(std::min<uint32>(SMART_EVENT_PHASE_12, mEventPhase + p));
4528}
4529
4530void SmartScript::DecPhase(uint32 p)
4531{
4532 if (p >= mEventPhase)
4533 {
4534 SetPhase(0);
4535 }
4536 else
4537 {
4538 SetPhase(mEventPhase - p);
4539 }
4540}
4541
4542void SmartScript::SetPhase(uint32 p)
4543{
4544 uint32 oldPhase = mEventPhase;
4545
4546 mEventPhase = p;
4547
4548 if (oldPhase != mEventPhase)
4549 {
4550 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_EVENT_PHASE_CHANGE);
4551 }
4552}
4553
4554bool SmartScript::IsInPhase(uint32 p) const
4555{
4556 if (mEventPhase == 0)
4557 {
4558 return false;
4559 }
4560
4561 return ((1 << (mEventPhase - 1)) & p) != 0;
4562}
